pages.text: The maids' skin is completely customizable, you can easily change the maids' skin in game.$(br2)you can also add a third-party resource pack to increase the style of the maid's skin.$(br2)Use the $(l:https://blockbench.net/)Blockbench$(/l) software to easily create your own maid skin resource pack, and place the package in the $(#f00)tlm_custom_pack$() folder under the game directory.
Click the button in the picture to open the maid skin GUI.
